overview:
Roy de Souza,38, is the CEO and co-founder of ZEDO, the 3rd largest global Internet ad-serving firm and a full service ad operations company.

Roy founded ZEDO in Silicon Valley in the midst of the Internet boom in 1999.Today, ZEDO has scaled up to 150 people with offices in San Francisco, London, Mumbai, Goa and St Petersburg.

Roy was educated at Oxford University and attended the MBA program at the Kellogg School at Northwestern University

Widely regarded as an expert in Advertising on Social Networks, Roy is a well- known figure in the online advertising industry on the West Coast (USA) and a frequent speaker at ‘ad:tech’ and other industry conferences.
